content: I contend that we are both atheists. I just believe in one fewer god than you do. When you understand why you dismiss all the other possible gods, you will understand why I dismiss yours.
translations: ita:Io sostengo che siamo entrambi atei. Solo che io credo in un dio in meno di te. Quando capirete perch√© respingete tutti
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by deniko (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
